name: Fixes arm64v8 extraction core dump
body: fixes #105

name: 2.0.2 - fixes core dump on archive extraction
body:
fixes #105 - update 7zbindings + 10 core dump
    
    - Stabilize to 10.0.2 oracle image for latest 10 is bugged and linked to
      1.8.2
    - Update 7zip java bindings to latest 16.02-2.01 | 2020-02-19

name: 2.0.1 - Fixes app mountpoint with root rights (preventing container copy)
2.0.0 - Adds sharded environment support
body:
# BC Break
JDownloader instance is now stored in `/opt/JDownloader/app`. previously was in `/opt/JDownloader/`. 
Please check README for sharded installations.

READ #102, #94 for more information

may fix #98, #93, #91, #88, #82, #74, #70, #54, #28
Adds utf-8 encoding for filenames issue

name: Adds new 7zip bindings for arm64 / untested
body: fixes #75 - needs to be tested on a arm64 device (which I don't have)

name: Adds umask feature
body:
fixes #66 

Add `UMASK` environment file to define your downloaded files rights. (cf https://github.com/jaymoulin/docker-jdownloader#environment-variables).

Make sure to update your image + container to 1.4.0 to be able to use this feature

name: Should fix rar4 password extraction
body: #49 - changes openjdk8 for openjdk11 - not compatible with rpi zero (yet)

name: fixes issue with comma in passwords
body: fixes #46 - Problem with comma in password

name: Adds env configuration files
body: Adds #45

Fix
---
- fixes #39 - Autofix when crashed update
- Fixes #40 - changes User download folder

Misc
----
- Changes arm building system to debian one
- Fixes daemon conditions + autofix
- Clarify Jdownloader version

name: Adds direct connections
body: #33 - adds direct connections instructions

name: Add arm32v6 + armhf support
body:
now works on your rpi zero

fixes #20 / #22

name: Add arch to docker image version
Non privileged user
body:
fixes #13 - run as non root user (can download files with your user)
fixes #12 - fixes arm64 support

name: RAR5 support
body: #10 - RAR5 support

name: Fixed configure command + reduce image size
Fixes bash error on start
body: Fixes bash error on start

name: add ffmpeg
body: Add ffmpeg so jdownloader can should what format to download of VOD sites

name: Fix updatable binary
body: Jdownloader can now be updated without recreating the container thanks to tini (https://github.com/krallin/tini) implemented by AVK93 (https://github.com/AVK93)

name: Use docker instead of build.sh
body: Dockerfile can build image without build.sh

name: Autoupdatable binary
body: Fixes autoupdatable Jdownloader

name: Autoextractable archives
body: - Fixes zip archive autoextraction

name: Autoupdatable binary
body: This release should allow autoupdatable binay
